contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=January 2009}} {{Chinese name|Zhao}} '''Zhao Taimou''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 赵太侔; [[Pinyin]]: Zhào Tàimóu; 1889–1968) is a Chinese educator. He was the president of [[Shandong University]] in [[Qingdao]] from September 1932 until June 1936, and again from 1946 until 1949. {{s-start}} {{s-aca}} {{succession box | before = [[Yang Zhensheng]] | title = President of [[Shandong University]] | years = 1932–1936 | after = [[Lin Jiqing]] }} {{succession box | before = [[Lin Jiqing]] | title = President of [[Shandong University]] | years = 1946–1949 | after = [[Hua Gang]] }} {{s-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Zhao, Taimou | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Chinese educator | DATE OF BIRTH = 1889 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1968 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zhao, Taimou}} [[Category:1889 births]] [[Category:1968 deaths]] [[Category:Shandong University faculty]] [[Category:Presidents of universities and colleges in China]] {{China-academic-bio-stub}}
